description: The PATIENT_DOCS table contains information about each document that is attached to a patient record, including scanned and electronically signed documents.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient with this document.

columns.name: DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: The ID of the document for this patient.
